FuncDef: This command defines the attribute that will in addition to framed-ip-address (inside IP address) and service-id be used for correlating BNG subscriber with the NAT subscriber.

ParaDef.Info: specifies the RADIUS vendor ID. Values-standard, nokia (6527), 3gpp. ParamDefault: Default- nokia

Specifies the RADIUS attribute to be used as subscriber. identifier. Values-alc-sub-string (nokia) - Subscriber-id string (Alc-Subsc-ID-Str) is cached in Large Scale NAT44 application and used to correlate Large Scale NAT44 subscriber to BNG subscriber..
